name: Prizm
description:
FPS puzzle game where shape, size and color matter.

You have to play with your mouse and keyboard (W,S,A,D or arrow keys). The mouse left button shoot and the right button grab/drop. The mouse scrollwheel change your gun mode and can rotate what you've grabbed. You can combine and divide only pieces of the same size and shape.

This game was made in 24 hours during the BBQ Game Jam 2016 in Metz, France. The theme was "Divide and conquer". We were 5 to make this game.
